General.Name: Centrais Elétricas de Santa Catarina S.A.
General.Description: Centrais Elétricas de Santa Catarina S.A., through its subsidiaries, generates and distributes power in Brazil. It primarily owns hydroelectric plants, as well as distributes natural gas through pipes. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Florianópolis, Brazil.
